review: I like it the wife and kids can use it with no problems ordered a 2nd for the bedroo
author: Timothy santhuff

review: I will start by saying that I am an Apple TV owner and this Stick blows the apple away Hands down. More  bang for your buck!  More apps things syncs with prime membership.  It's has changed the way I have and will watch tv.  Good job Amazon!  Keep it up!
author: Jonathan Kelly

review: This is an amazing little device.  I am not real tech savvy so I was pleasantly surprised how easy the set up was as well as navigating through the various apps.  I would definitely recommend.  I just wish Amazon Prime had more (read watch-worthy) free content.  The prices on the movies and TV shows is a little ridiculous.
author: Shannon Powers

review: Excellant it makes the television like it is when you play the xbox or your playstation. So awesom.
